Package src.boundary

Class FileHandler

Object
FileHandler
public class FileHandler
extends Object
FileHandler class handles all read and write requests with the database.

  • Method Details

    • readToSet

      public static Set<String> readToSet​(String filename)
      Reads data from a file under data folder and returns a set of strings containing the data.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      Returns:
      a set of string which are lines read from the database

    • readRow

      public static String[] readRow​(String filename, String attribute)
      Reads all lines of a file and search the string array and see if the first attribute matches the attribute.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      attribute - the pattern we are looking for in the file
      Returns:
      the matching row or null if no match found

    • readRow

      public static String[] readRow​(String filename, String attribute, int col)
      Reads all lines of a file and search the string array and see if the attribute at col matches the attribute.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      attribute - the pattern we are looking for in the file
      col - the row that the pattern appears in the file
      Returns:
      the matching row or null if no match found

    • save

      public static void save​(String filename, String content)
      Writes content to a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      content - the content to write to the .csv file

    • writeLine

      public static void writeLine​(String filename, String attribute, String line)
      Replace the existing row if any match is found else write a new line.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      attribute - the attribute looking for in the .csv file
      line - the content to write to the .csv file

    • generatePath

      private static String generatePath​(String filename)
      Generates the relative path to the project directory.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file name of the .csv file
      Returns:
      the generated relative path
